title: Router: Frontend + Desktop UX
description: Routes UI and desktop-wrapper requests to the appropriate packs.

content.mermaid:
flowchart TD
  Input[UI/Desktop request] --> UI{frontend?}
  UI -->|react spa| React[pack.ui.frontend.react_spa.v1]
  UI -->|desktop wrapper| Wrap{which?}
  Wrap -->|electron| E[pack.desktop.wrapper.electron.v1]
  Wrap -->|tauri| T[pack.desktop.wrapper.tauri.v1]
  Input -->|winforms ux| WF[pack.dotnet.winforms.ux.modernize.v1]
  React --> Done[Done]
  E --> Done
  T --> Done
  WF --> Done
